name: Copper Fungicide 1L
description: Broad-spectrum copper fungicide for bacterial and fungal leaf spots and blights.

name: Mancozeb Fungicide
description: Protectant fungicide effective against Alternaria and early blight.

name: Chlorothalonil Spray
description: Multi-site protectant fungicide for leaf spot and blight control.

name: Systemic Blight Controller
description: Systemic oomycete fungicide for late blight management.

name: Neem Oil 500ml
description: Organic neem oil for mites, whiteflies and fungal suppression.

name: Bio-Bactericide
description: Biological control product to reduce bacterial spot pressure on tomatoes and peppers.

name: Sulfur Fungicide
description: Sulfur-based fungicide for powdery mildew and other surface fungal problems.

name: Whitefly Sticky Traps (pack)
description: Sticky yellow traps for monitoring and reducing whitefly populations.

name: Organic Mite Killer
description: Miticide for control of two-spotted spider mites.

name: Sanitizer for Tools
description: Alcohol-based sanitizer to disinfect hand tools and reduce spread of viruses and bacteria.
